short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables quality of life operations on Github with the use of the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides formatting to copy text from Github pull requests and release pages for message-ops.

Features:
- Formats any string with our tags for single-click copying
- Access to url, title and changelog data 
- Multiple buttons for different operations
